title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.6 - Damaging of trees, shrubs, plants, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.6 - Damaging of trees, shrubs, plants, etc

State Regulations

Cutting, mutilating or removing any tree, shrub, flower, plant, topsoil, etc. within the parkway system, is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
